scenes.label: *from_AC_03_12a
texts: Relieved of tension and fear, my body could move freely, and I collapsed where I stood.
Things got bad and I had to Load. I was suddenly on these tracks and...
There was no way I could explain it.
Oh, don't worry. That won't happen this time.
Before getting transported to the tracks, I'd felt someone touch my shoulder. That was probably the trigger for it.
It'd happened about five or six minutes after we went into Room 201. Knowing that was enough for me to avoid it.
I didn't know what the trick was, but I'd have plenty of time to figure it out once I dodged it.
I released the electronic lock just like before, and we both stepped inside Room 201 again.
We explained the situation to Lime Nukui, and I began setting up the backdoor.
I'd never seen the person, but I knew they'd be here.
Keeping an eye out, I finished up the work on the app and created a backdoor for Nakano Symphonies.
I removed the wire from the carrianode and—
I spun around, took Momo's hand, and pulled on it.
A familiar woman stood in front of us.
I searched her face and the name "JUNO" appeared immediately.
She was the one Oz had almost run over.
So she's number one in the quest rankings? Didn't see that coming.
Would you happen to know anything about Cicada? We're looking for him.
But there was no joy in her eyes.
She began slowly walking towards Momo.
I had a bad feeling about this.
Both vanished in an instant. I had to find them.
I felt something behind me, and when I turned around...
I reached out and touched the body trapped in the wall.
His eyes were as beads of glass. Devoid of any thought or feeling.
